text:
**Linux Mint** is an Ubuntu-based distribution whose goal is to provide a complete out-of-the-box experience by including browser plugins, support for DVD playback, Java and other components. It also adds a custom desktop and menus, several unique configuration tools, and a web-based package installation interface. It is the most popular meme distro of all time.
**Notable features**
- Custom, new applications providing for alternative cases for video, audio and work.
- All Ubuntu packages are compatible (although exercising caution is advised to avoid breakage). 
- Home to the latest Cinnamon packaged.
**Available DEs**
- Cinnamon
- GNOME
- KDE
- MATE
- Xfce
**More info**
https://linuxmint.com/
